verses.roman:
ataeva viṣṇu takhana kṛṣṇera śarīre
viṣṇu-dvāre kare kṛṣṇa asura-saṁhāre

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; viṣṇu—Lord Viṣṇu; takhana—at that time; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; śarīre—in the body; viṣṇu-dvāre—by Lord Viṣṇu; kare—does; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; asura-saṁhāre—killing the demons.
translation: At that time, therefore, Lord Viṣṇu is present in the body of Lord Kṛṣṇa, and Lord Kṛṣṇa kills the demons through Him.
